concept.title: Terms and Policies
concept.shortdesc: What you agree to when using AirClassroom.

section.title: When using AirClassroom, you agree to the following...

sl.sli: - To only use your reserved room for the purpose you specify when booking. No parties!
- To leave the classroom exactly as you found it after use. Clean it up for the next person!
- To respect Virginia Tech's property by proper use and care. If you break it, you buy it!

- When you book with AirClassroom, we expect that you and only those affiliated with you use the classroom. Please do not sell or give your reservation to another party, as we have cancellation and transfer protocol for such situations.
- You must have at least one person occupying your AirClassroom at all times during the length of your reservation.

- If you're confused about something, never assume. Always check our troubleshooting pages found on this website. If you can't find the answer there, please feel free to contact us at airclassroom@vt.edu or 1-800-AIRVT.
